scenario_text.value:
Look, look, Takuma! There’s something there!
Whoaaa!

What’s with that thing? Are you sure it’s not
going to attack?
It appears wary of our presence.

Maybe that’s why it’s upset. It’s been
glaring at us this whole time...

Shouldn’t we treat its wound? That’s probably
why it’s so agitated.

You’re so kind, Takuma! You sound just like
Aoi.

Are you sure? That creature’s wounded.
It might try to fight back.
I’m sure it’s fine. Hey, you! Come here!
I’m sure it’s fine. Hey, you! Come here!

(It looks scared of us... Maybe it’s the
injury.)

(I’m sure it’ll see we mean no harm if we
take it slow and steady.)
